user_question: Can you help me find the latest advances in solar panel technology, and generate an image of a futuristic solar panel design?
final_answer: The latest advances in solar panel technology include bifacial panels, perovskite solar cells, and transparent solar panels. Perovskite solar cells are a type of solar cell that includes a perovskite-structured compound as the light-absorbing layer, offering high efficiency and low cost. Image of a futuristic solar panel design generated.
